text:
[Verse]
Woke up to the sound
Raindrops hitting ground
Sky painted in gray
Won't go far today

[Verse 2]
Puddles on the street
Cold beneath my feet
Umbrella's got a hole
Water fills my soul

[Chorus]
Constant rain won't stop
Falling down nonstop
But we'll dance and sing
In the rain we'll swing

[Verse 3]
Clouds won't let us see
But together we'll be
Storm can't bring us down
We'll splash all around

[Chorus]
Constant rain won't stop
Falling down nonstop
But we'll dance and sing
In the rain we'll swing

[Bridge]
Every drop a beat
Making life so sweet
Underneath this sky
You and I will fly
title: Constant Rain
